text: Tomadera byapare krpanatabasata [1]. Atahpara yakhana bhiti ase takhana apani dekhabena, mrtyubhaye murcchatura byaktira mata cokha ultiye tara apanara dike takaya. Kintu yakhana bhaya cale yaya takhana tara dhanera lalasaya tomaderake tiksna bhasaya bid'dha kare [2]. Tara imana aneni phale allah tadera kaja-karma nisphala karechena ebam eta allahara pakse sahaja
